Author: jewishmilf69

Author: thefakemexoxo
Text: I fucking hate this. My boyfriend weighs like 10lbs less than me and when he weighs himself he jokingly tells me to come over and look how fat he is. Every time it takes off of my strength not to grab that glass scale and crack it over his pretty little head ğŸ˜…
